name: Coda Plug-in
summary: Learn about .CODAPLUGIN files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You can double-click a CODAPLUGIN file to install it. The plugin will be saved to ~/​Library/​Application Support/​Coda 2/​Plug-ins/​.

description: Plugin file used by Coda web development software; contains a plugin that adds new features to the software, such as support for additional languages, website backups, or source code validation.
